title: Train Fault Impacting Service Between Kembangan and Eunos

title_translations.zh-Hans: 列车故障影响榜鹅与樟宜机场之间服务
title_translations.ms: Gangguan Kereta Api Mempengaruhi Perkhidmatan Antara Kembangan dan Eunos
title_translations.ta: கெம்பாங்கன் மற்றும் யூனோஸ் இடையே சேவையை பாதிக்கும் ரயில் கோளாறு

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Train services from #PasirRis towards #JooKoon are now operating normally.
[EWL] UPDATE: Train traveling at a slower speed. Estimate 20 mins additional travel time from #PasirRis towards #JooKoon due to train fault.
[EWL]: Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time from #Kembangan to #Eunos due to train fault.
